Issue documentation¶

Server module of MUD game

class moodserver.server.Dungeon(size: int = 10)¶

Instance of this class represents a dungeon in the game

class moodserver.server.EmptyCell¶

Instances of this class indicate empty cell in dungeon

class moodserver.server.MessageToTranslate(event: str, params: list = [])¶

Instances of this class represents output messages for users which have to be translated

class moodserver.server.Monster(name: str, hitpoints: str, greeting: str)¶

Instances of this class indicate monster in dungeon cell

class moodserver.server.Player¶

Instance of this class represents the player in the dungeon

class moodserver.server.Server(host: str = '0.0.0.0', port: int = 1337)¶

Instance of this class represents the server which runs the game

Parameters:

  • _clients (dict['str':asyncio.Queue]) – storage of clients’ queues

  • _players (dict['str':Player]) – storage of players in the game

  • _dungeon (Dungeon) – game’s dungeon

addmon(ID: str, name: str, x: int, y: int, hitpoints: int, greeting: str) → str¶

Method to add a monster

Parameters:

  • ID (str) – identificator of a player

  • name (str) – name of a monster

  • x (int) – monster’s position on axis X

  • y (int) – monster’s position on axis Y

  • hitpoints (int) – hitpoints of the monster

  • greeting (str) – monster’s greeting to players

Returns:

monster’s deployment notification

Return type:

str

attack(ID: str, name: str, hitpoints: int) → str¶

Method to attack a monster by player

Parameters:

  • ID (str) – identificator of a player

  • name (str) – name of a monster to be attacked

  • hitpoints (int) – damage to be made to the monster

Returns:

log of attacking

Return type:

str

async chat(reader: StreamReader, writer: StreamWriter) → None¶

Method to process a player’s client side

Parameters:

  • reader (asyncio.StreamReader) – represents a reader object that provides APIs to read data from the IO stream

  • writer (asyncio.StreamWriter) – represents a writer object that provides APIs to write data to the IO stream

encounter(ID: str) → str¶

Method to check if a player has encountered a monster

Parameters:

ID (str) – identificator of a player

Returns:

monster’s greeting if player’s met a monster

Return type:

str

async monster_migration() → None¶

Method to pick random monster and direction every 30 seconds and move monster in this direction

move(ID: str, dx: int, dy: int) → str¶

Method to move a player in the dungeon

Parameters:

  • ID (str) – identificator of a player

  • dx (int) – offset along axis X

  • dy (int) – offset along axis Y

Returns:

notification of movement and monster’s greeting if meeting happend

Return type:

str

start() → None¶

Method to start the server

translate(ID: str, message: MessageToTranslate) → str¶

Method to translate whole message for the player

Parameters:

  • ID (str) – identificator of a player

  • message (str) – message for the player

Returns:

translated message for the player

Return type:

str

static translate_event(event: str, params: list[str], _, ngettext) → str¶

Method to transform event to its translated description

Parameters:

  • event (str) – event

  • params (list[str]) – parameters for the event

  • _ (function) – gettext

  • ngettext (function) – ngettext

Returns:

translated description of the event

Return type:

str
